00047 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00049 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /* Const of SCSI_SenseData_Typedef                                                                          */
00051 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 /* Sense Key                                                                                                */
00053 #define SK_NO_SENSE                               (0x00)
00054 #define SK_RECOVERED_ERROR                        (0x01)
00055 #define SK_NOT_READY                              (0x02)
00056 #define SK_MEDIUM_ERROR                           (0x03)
00057 #define SK_HARDWARE_ERROR                         (0x04)
00058 #define SK_ILLEGAL_REQUEST                        (0x05)
00059 #define SK_UNIT_ATTENTION                         (0x06)
00060 #define SK_DATA_PROTECT                           (0x07)
00061 #define SK_BLANK_CHECK                            (0x08)
00062 #define SK_VENDOR_SPECIFIC                        (0x09)
00063 #define SK_COPY_ABORTED                           (0x0A)
00064 #define SK_ABORTED_COMMAND                        (0x0B)
00065 #define SK_VOLUME_OVERFLOW                        (0x0D)
00066 #define SK_MISCOMPARE                             (0x0E)
00067 /* Additional Sense Code (ASC)                                                                              */
00068 #define ASC_UNRECOVERED_READ_ERROR                (0x11)
00069 #define ASC_PARAMETER_LIST_LENGTH_ERROR           (0x1A)
00070 #define ASC_INVALID_COMMAND                       (0x20)
00071 #define ASC_ADDRESS_OUT_OF_RANGE                  (0x21)
00072 #define ASC_INVALID_FIELED_IN_COMMAND             (0x24)
00073 #define ASC_INVALID_FIELD_IN_PARAMETER_LIST       (0x26)
00074 #define ASC_WRITE_PROTECTED                       (0x27)
00075 #define ASC_MEDIUM_HAVE_CHANGED                   (0x28)
00076 #define ASC_MEDIUM_NOT_PRESENT                    (0x3A)
00077 
00078 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00079 void SBC_Init(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u32 uLun);
00080 void SBC_CMDHandler(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB);
00081 void SBC_DataIN(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB);
00082 void SBC_DataOUT(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB);
00083 void SBC_UpdateSenseData(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 uSenseKey, u8 uAdditionalSenseCode);
